The Atlantic Current: Mapping the Virgins of Guadalupe and Remedios

Fonz, Huesca, Aragon

Katherine Dau

Unverified

The town of Fonz holds a feast of the Assumption on August 15 every year. It is unclear whether there is any devotion to Remedios.

Works cited

  1. “Fonz” Wikipedia.
  2. “Fiestas y Tradiciones” Ayuntamiento de Fonz.
